values:
19 weeks ago?  Shit! I need to post more often.

I can't keep up with all the different formats to blog with these days.

I don't know which one I like, but I know in two years or less, something new will come out that will have all your blogging/instant messaging/video conferencing/gaming/chatting/dating needs.  So until then! lol.

I love life.

I miss my friends that I haven't seen in ages.

I went and saw VAST last Thursday in Hollywood and Friday in Santa Ana.  They were both awesome shows, and I found myself feeling really at home with my old friends.  It was definitely a good experience for me.

So, I'm jamming today with Wes, the newest edition to the band -- guitarist/bassist and writer.  We've jammed a few times in the past and gone over a lot of material and I see only good things in the future.

I need one more band member.  Ideally, a bassist/guitarist who can sing.  The band is into the whole 'switching up' of instrumentation.

We currently have about 25 tunes to pick from, but we want to focus on 8-9 tunes to polish for a good live show, even if we only get to choose a few of them.

Life is moving along at a steady pace and it's time for me to kick it all up a notch.

So, now that the holidays are over, I finally get to get settled.  Today was the last day of tearing down lights, and tomorrow we take down the tree.  bleh.

Anyway, things are strange and dramatic within the family, but I'm doing alright personally.  Just have a lot of things to sort out.

New Years Eve / b-day party was awesome!  Thanks everyone who came!

I let my LJ go into the cavernous pit of my past.  Hahaha.

Time for a resurrection!  I don't think I spelled that right and it's easier to keep on typing rather than use a spell check.  I'm tired.

So.  I started a diet today and I'm trying to get to the gym more than 3 times a week.  I don't have a bunch to lose - I just want to get in shape and prevent myself from getting fat during another christmas/holiday season.

I've got great material going on the music front.  Things that I feel really capture the essence of my creative side.  I am content and busy.  Yet I still have an open schedule.  Anyone need a new employee? ;)

Hey everyone!

Thanks for sending this message to me, Valis.  I would have just left this thing dormant for a while.

HELLO HELLO!!!! 

For anyone who wants to know, I've been really productive lately.  I have almost a full album now!  Now if I could only get my programs to authorize, i could record them! lol

Touring with VAST was a blast, but now I'm back in Southern California and writing with a fury!

I miss everyone!

Let me know how you are and send me a message!

Hi everyone.  For the first time in a while, I think I'm feeling happy. :)

I have nice friends, a wonderful family, and a much healthier outlook on life.


I have a lot of new songs too, which makes me happy.  Songs with actual words.
This is  a good day.  These are good things.  Pat is good.

I think I'll start posting new pictures soon... all of my old ones are outdated.   I'll post them here and on myspace as well.

Oh yeah... my myspace accounts

My Music: www.myspace.com/silentechoes
      ME     : www.myspace.com/midpat

Hey everyone.  I'm back in Southern Cali.  

Call me at my parent's if you know the number. 

If not, email me.

I am bored.

Anyone wanna keep me company?  I've got goodies.

So, things have been moving along... working, writing music, making new art.  I've been on a drawing kick lately.  I want to finish the design for my tattoo by June.  That's my goal.  My tatt will pretty much cover most of my upper back... including a column of ink going down my backbone all the way to my ass.

It'll rawk.

Today, I'm at work.  Just trying to adjust and push onward.

I'm a strong person, and I'm going to get through this.

I love you, my friends.



Man... being single is strange.  I need to get laid. lol. ;)

Today, she packed up most of her belongings and took them.

We cried together again for hours.

She left me a note that said "I will love you always"



I can't stop crying.
She told me last night that she was leaving me.

Well, life is strange.

It always is.

My current relationship is faltering... which is really lame considering that I haven't.  But, unfortunately, when one person isn't ready for a relationship no matter what the other person does, they can't 'fix' the problem.

So, I'm just confused and hurt, but ready to take charge of my life.  

Currently, I have offers from 4 different venues in Austin to play shows as Silent Echoes, so I'm getting a makeshift band together so that I can play a few gigs and drop my name around town.  Now this does NOT mean that I will be any less involved with VAST!  Hopefully, if -my- band works out like it should, you'll be seeing Silent Echoes open up for VAST on the road.

Is this what I thought I'd be doing AT ALL??? No.  But life's funny that way.  

So...  I may be staying in Austin for another couple of months.... instead of going back to San Diego at the end of March, it looks like I'll be back there the first week in June... or whatever.  We'll see what happens.

And who knows... I might even be joining the single world again soon.

*sigh*

The reflection comes severed
because you've broken your back.
Beating your own will down, 
and bruising this porcelain beauty.

A hunger kindles the embers
driving you further below,
But veins draw to the surface
and tempt this blood to drain again... 
To spill it on the sand.

Chasing my own tail
eroding away the world below me
Feeding the parasite
Starving myself as it swallows me alive.

The pit comes engulfed
because you fill it with poison.
Drowning yourself in the deep
while licking away the wounds.

Looking at the world, I see history and little else.

Creativity - the link from Man to God.

Ego - the discussion by Man unto himself.

Intelligence - the mislabeled bastard child of creativity and ego.

Just a few thoughts.



"As these spiraling times push us toward the bottom,
I dive into your eyes - avoiding the excess splinters that plague my dull senses.  There I discover a new place - a world outside of myself.  My reality, falling away, becoming more than I'm allowed.  More than I should ever be....

Independent only in my subjectivity." -Me

Hey everybody!

I'm coming down to San Diego (Carlsbad/Vista) from January 5th through the 9th! :)

Anyone who misses me better get their asses in gear and let me know!



Coffee, cloves, the beach, family, and old friends.

NOTHING sounds better right now.



I didn't really realize how homesick I've been... until I looked around and realized that I didn't have friends in Austin.

*clears throat*

Alright... it's about time that I listed something for you people. 

Here's a tentative tracklisting. (so far)

1. Shadowpush -(aka Mars the Catastrophe)
2. Sight
3. Eleventh Day
4. The Ego -(aka Hardcore)
5. Immortalized in Dreams -(aka The Rift)
6. Temperamental Doll -(Indusrock)
7. Barrage -(NEW)
8. Placement -(With Ben Fenton)
9. Falling Prey -(NEW)


That's a listing so far.

These are all of the songs I am currently working on.

:)

Lookin' good so far!!

profiles.myspace.com/users/7940555

That's my account for 'silent echoes'

I'm not sure what my account listing is for ME, but you can search for me using midpat@cox.net as my email.

Thanks!

Man I'm bored.  Just sitting home alone with nothing to do but drink a few beers and play some guitar.

What a Saturday night.

Time to go pickup laundry.

I'm at work.

Work is nice, but boring.

I'm designing my tattoo.  I should be scanning in some ideas and working on it today.

I have a myspace.com account.  One for midpat@cox.net and one for silent_echoes@cox.net

Say hi and listen to some music if you'd like.


WOW, my hair is long.  It now goes down to my mid-chest area in the front and lays between the top of my shoulder blades in the back.  Nuts.  I didn't realize how fast my hair grew!  I'm thinking about dying it a gradient dark to deep (bold, yet bright) red.  Maybe a blonde streak or two.

I know I've been missing in action... and if anyone still has me listed as a friend.... "HI!!!"  And I've missed you all!

I have revamped an old song!

http://members.cox.net/silent_echoes/Silent_Echoes(Sight).mp3

And you can find me on myspace.  Just go to www.myspace.com and click 'music'  then, enter "Silent Echoes" in the search field! 

Tell me what you think!!

And life is moving along.  It's been an interesting ride so far.

Patrick

Hey everyone, just in case you didn't know, I'll be on Last Call with Carson Daly tonight on NBC, playing guitar for VAST.

Talk to you soon. :)

Hey everyone, how's it going.  Sorry that I didn't post when I was on TV last, but don't dispair!  We'll be on Last Call with Carson Daly again Tomorrow night!

So, anyone who wants to see me perform with VAST, you can tune to NBC tomorrow night right after Conan! :)

We perform "Thrown Away", the latest VAST single at that time. :)

Later!

The show last night was incredible! I love this country!  The crowd was fantastic, and everyone just kept singing along wherever they could.  The vibe was great, and for it being completely sold out, it was almost overwhelming.

I'm so glad I had a chance to play London and to meet a shitload of new and interesting people.

I am finally happy.

And thank you to everyone who's gone through the best and worst times of my life with me.  Without you, I'd be a whimpering idiot.

:)

Hey everyone.  I'm in London!

I have a show tonight at the Camden Underground with VAST, and we go back to the states on Sunday!

What's new with everyone?  I now live in Austin, TX with my girlfriend Jessica - I've been busy with the VAST tour since April, and everything's been going great!

We play just a few more dates, and then we're off the road for about a month - but we're going to tour again right after that for about 4-6 weeks. :)  So if you missed me, you can come see us next time!

Sorry I've been MIA for so long, but since I moved to Austin, I just haven't really had time for anything other than real life ;)

Patrick

I just wrote a fucking masterpiece about modern-day cubicle disorders and LIVEJOURNAL SUCKS COCK because it was unable to find the server upon my posting of the entry.

So, fuck you livejournal and fuck that great post.

Grrr.

I'm caffeinated and I was already pissed.

So how is everyone?

Well, today I re-started the day job.  Woopie. 

I'm bored.

How is everyone?
hahaha.... well, it's the only one i could find at the moment. sorry about the size...

It's been long enough since I posted.  What's up everyone??

Still haven't toured yet, but I'll keep everyone updated.  right now, i'm just trying to sort out my life and keep things in order.

Patrick :)

My Grandfather, William Paul McGuire passed away this morning at 10:30.

"I am that I am."

We all are.

Thank you.

Well. Too much has happened to write about.

Right  now, I'm in New York and loving it.  I'll be back home in a few days, but I love it here.  Getting a chance to work and play and move forward towards my dreams. 

It really is amazing.

And yes, again I am in love.

Hard times and trials ahead, but I am prepared for them.


I can't believe how things end up the way that they do... but i just look at the stars and smile - and bathe in the cool glow of the midnight moon.

Thank everything for everything.

And I miss you, my friends.

Confused, but not afraid, nor depressed.

I am really enjoying my time right now.  Being broke tends to lean me towards writing more and being around good friends.

Drama at the apartment regarding a roommate and a friends little sister and a party.  Heh, life's drama's never seem to let up. hehe.

Well, time for me to brave the world.

Once, I was happy.

Now, I'm afraid.

But we all are, aren't we?

I went to the gym tonight.... and I still haven't been able to sleep.  Oh well. I'll try soon.

Hm. To any of you wondering why I haven't replied to your comments, it's because my browser won't let me.  I'm currently trying to solve the problems I'm having, but i'm having some issues. lol.

Just to let you know...
More camwhoreness... awww... how cute heh... me smiling more??? HAHAHAHA funny shit. Maybe I should do a shot in makeup... that would be fun...ll

The new VAST website is up! It's BEAUTIFUL!

http://www.realvast.com

go!!!

New internet!!!!

Hell yeah.

I have a new pic i'm posting in a bit... just me dabbling around with my new webcam.

Time to catch up.

Patrick

How compatible with me are YOU?
:D This was fun.

Still working on getting that internet connection.  Damn cable company keeps rescheduling on me, so I get to say hi to everyone now :)

Hi to the new people who added me as a friend... sorry, but I don't have time yet to sift through your names and add you back - give me a few days.

Things are going fairly well - I'm trying to get out of my lease and/or sign it over, so we'll see.

So inspired lately... inspiration is a beautiful thing.

As many of the VAST ezboard members already know - and most of my friends... I am going to be touring with the band VAST as guitar/backup vocals and keyboards! My life owns. Their site is here: http://www.realvast.com Don't expect too much from the site until next week though. Thank you to everyone, and for your support. Much love.

Only 11 more days of this job.

I can't wait.  This place has really been taxing me.
Now i'll be able to focus on the new one and prepping to move all of my stuff.

And much more free time in order to get things together.

Ahh.

When the earth is ravaged and the animals are dying, a new tribe of people shall come unto the earth from many colors, classes, creeds, and who by their actions and deeds shall make the earth green again. They will be known as the warriors of the Rainbow -- Old Native American Prophecy That's fucking awesome. Sounds like they're coming... heh.

My life is changing.  
It seems that all of my hard work is paying off - finally.
I'm no longer a part of "Downshift".  We had too many issues - well... I had too many issues with the drummer.  I felt as if I was gasping for air.... so I had to move on.  

Silent Echoes is still running strong, and I will constantly be writing for it. For me.

For those of you who know my recent WONDERFUL news, please realize that I told you that information with the faith that you will keep it to yourself.  Everyone will know in a short time, so lay low and let it be a suprise.
:)

I'm so fucking happy... and I'm ready to bust ass.

Patrick Michael

Introspective again, sitting, fearing, loathing, clawing.  The same bullshit, the same drama, the same poignant idiocy.  Random and fleeting.

I find it funny that my entire life, I've been fed my own insecurities by other people and never really interpreted them for myself until after high school.  It's been years, and now I look back. I reflect upon the mirror of what I am and what I have been.  I was always told that I was a late bloomer.  I lost my virginity at 18. I smoked pot for the first time at 19.  I went to college at 20.  The more I look back, the more I realize that they were wrong.  They made me believe what wasn't true. That I was blooming later than everyone, that I was behind in development, and that I couldn't tell my ass from my face.  The reality is - that from the ages of 10-17, I watched.  I grew in ways that showed me the world.  I found wisdom, honour and courtesy.  I may have passed up other things, but they came to me later... not as a late bloomer, but as a mature boy finding himself launched into a man's world - and finding peace within combining what I found and embracing what was to come.

I'm proud of myself, and look towards the future with an open heart, no matter how many nails get driven into it.

Odd moods, odd events. Life is changing.

Haha... I think that I've been a nerdy grunge-goth boi at heart my entire life... Isn't it obvious? I mean... I play jazz on the sax, yet write hard rock/industrial music and love writing A-Tonal darkwave drum and bass. LoL I'm a very odd mix, but I wouldn't have it any other way.

Is the garage really a room? I guess so.
If you were a room in a house, what room would you be? On another note - I love you, my friends. Keep strong during these times, and remember - I'm always here... to keep your mind on track, or completely in orbit. ;) Have a beautiful, fresh day. Patrick Michael
